Falls ill soon after, requiring convalescence at home.

Flings the cherry-colored ribbons violently in Captain Best's face and rushes out with his sword drawn.

Fires deliberately and accurately in a duel, resulting in Captain Best being wounded.

Responds curtly and suspiciously to the armed gentleman's questions, refusing to share his destination.

Invites guests warmly and makes them feel welcome with food and drink.

Ignores Councillor Mulligan's warning about the dangerous company and does not respond, instead walking away slowly.
